com.aurel.track.dao

Interface ScreenDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TScreenPeer

    public interface ScreenDAO
    DAO for Screen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Deletes a screen from the TScreen table Is deletable should return true before calling this method

      Verifies whether a screen is deletable
      java.util.List<TScreenBean> loadAll()

      Load the screenBeans by primary keys
      TScreenBean loadByPrimaryKey(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Gets a screenBean from the TScreen table
      TScreenBean loadFullByPrimaryKey(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Gets a screenBean from the TScreen table with all tabs, panels and fields
      void replaceScreen(java.lang.Integer oldScreenID, java.lang.Integer newScreenID)
      Replaces the dependences with a new screenID
      java.lang.Integer save(TScreenBean screen)
      Save screen in the TScreen table
      TScreenBean tryToLoadByPrimaryKey(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Gets a screenBean from the TScreen table, but fail silently if it does not exist
